Activity: Wake up, quick review of the presentation.
Log in, check emails and team communication. Finalize the presentation.
Present the weapon and player movement system designs to @LDES-1, @LPRO-1, @PROD-1, @3DMOD-1, @3DMOD-2, @LVDN-1. Gather feedback and address concerns.
Based on the feedback received, identify areas in the system designs that require revision or further clarification. Prioritize the most critical feedback.
Begin working on revisions to the weapon and player movement system designs based on the feedback. Focus on addressing concerns regarding balance and player feel.
Investigate the AI system requirements for the game. Since it's a third-person shooter, enemy AI is a crucial component.
Contact @LPRO-1 and @SDES-2 to discuss the current AI system plans and architecture. Topic: AI system planning and architecture
Read technical blogs related to the game, such as codingame.com.
Finalize the revisions and prepare them for review.
